components.content:
In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • confirm you intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs
  • agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • confirm your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, supports this submission
  • commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how you will spend the funding
components.name: LTyOhV

components.title: I intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in our needs
components.name: FLpMfV

components.title: I agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
components.name: PdObhd

components.title: I confirm that our section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, supports this submission
components.name: hsWqpW

components.title: I commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how we will spend the funding
components.name: YwlIXX

items.text: I confirm our emerging local plan will be at Regulation 19 stage on 12 March 2025
items.value: I confirm our emerging local plan will be at Regulation 19 stage on 12 March 2025

items.text: I confirm our new local housing need figure will be 25% or more greater than the housing requirement in your emerging local plan
items.value: I confirm our new local housing need figure will be 25% or more greater than the housing requirement in your emerging local plan

items.text: I agree to revise our plan to reflect the revised NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) and new LHN (local housing need) prior to submitting the document for examination
items.value: I agree to revise our plan to reflect the revised NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) and new LHN (local housing need) prior to submitting the document for examination

items.text: I commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how we will spend the funding
items.value: I commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how we will spend the funding
